products.name: RoseWow Velvet Rose Lip Balm
products.description: RoseWow Lip Balm is a delicate blend of soft moisture and gentle fragrance, crafted from rose petals to nourish and enhance your lips. With a smooth glide and long-lasting hydration, each balm is made to give you the color, the scent, and the softness of real roses. Whether you're treating yourself or gifting someone special, RoseWow brings beauty and care in every swipe.
products.tagline: Sustainably Beautiful. Made for Your Lips.
products.ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Beeswax, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Natural Flavor, Mica, Iron Oxides

reviews.comment: This lip balm is amazing! The scent is subtle and the moisture lasts all day.
Love the texture and how it feels on my lips. Would prefer a slightly stronger scent.

products.name: RoseWow Petal Kiss Lip Balm
products.description: Petal Kiss is our signature formula with a hint of sweetness. This nourishing lip balm combines the delicate essence of rose with a touch of honey for the perfect balance of moisture and protection. The lightweight formula glides on smoothly and provides long-lasting hydration without feeling heavy or greasy.
products.tagline: The Kiss of Nature. The Touch of Luxury.
products.ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Beeswax, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Oil, Mel (Honey) Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Natural Flavor, Mica, Iron Oxides

reviews.comment: The honey and rose combination is divine! My lips have never felt better.
This is my new favorite lip balm. The scent is perfect and it keeps my lips hydrated all day.

products.name: RoseWow Dewy Morning Lip Balm
products.description: Dewy Morning captures the fresh essence of roses touched by morning dew. This revitalizing lip balm combines rose water with aloe vera for a refreshing and hydrating experience. Perfect for starting your day with a burst of natural moisture and a subtle hint of rose.
products.tagline: Fresh as Morning Dew. Soft as Rose Petals.
products.ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Beeswax, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Natural Flavor

reviews.comment: So refreshing! I love using this in the morning as part of my routine.

products.name: RoseWow Midnight Berry Lip Balm
products.description: Midnight Berry combines the richness of dark berries with the elegance of rose essence. This luxurious lip balm offers deep hydration with a subtle berry tint that enhances your natural lip color. The formula is enriched with antioxidants from berry extracts to protect your lips while providing a burst of juicy flavor.
products.tagline: Berry Rich. Rose Elegant. Perfectly You.
products.ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Beeswax, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Oil, Vaccinium Myrtillus (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Natural Flavor, Mica, Iron Oxides

reviews.comment: The berry tint is perfect for evening wear! Love how it enhances my natural lip color.
Great color payoff and the berry scent is divine. Would buy again!

products.name: RoseWow Citrus Bloom Lip Balm
products.description: Citrus Bloom is a refreshing fusion of citrus notes and delicate rose essence. This energizing lip balm combines the revitalizing properties of citrus oils with the nourishing benefits of rose extract. The result is a burst of freshness that awakens your senses while providing deep hydration for your lips.
products.tagline: Refresh Your Lips. Awaken Your Senses.
products.ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Beeswax, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Oil, Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Natural Flavor, Mica, Iron Oxides

reviews.comment: The citrus scent is so refreshing! Perfect for my morning routine.

products.name: RoseWow Vanilla Rose Lip Balm
products.description: Vanilla Rose is a comforting blend of warm vanilla and delicate rose essence. This soothing lip balm combines the calming properties of vanilla with the nourishing benefits of rose oil. The creamy formula melts onto your lips, providing deep hydration with a hint of sweetness that lingers throughout the day.
products.ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Beeswax, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Oil, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Natural Flavor, Mica, Iron Oxides

reviews.comment: The vanilla and rose combination is heavenly! So comforting and moisturizing.
Love the scent and how smooth it feels. Perfect for dry winter lips!

products.name: RoseWow Lavender Dreams Lip Balm
products.description: Lavender Dreams is a calming blend of soothing lavender and gentle rose essence. This relaxing lip balm combines the stress-relieving properties of lavender with the nourishing benefits of rose oil. The silky formula glides on smoothly, providing long-lasting hydration with a subtle floral scent that promotes tranquility.
products.tagline: Calm Your Lips. Soothe Your Soul.
products.ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Beeswax, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Natural Flavor, Mica, Iron Oxides

reviews.comment: The lavender scent is so calming! I use this every night before bed.
